title: QBO Mapping Error Resolution
description: Form for resolving mapping issues between Alga entities and QuickBooks Online entities. Intended for registration with the Form Registry using the formId 'qbo_mapping_error'.

tenantId.title: Tenant ID
tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant experiencing the error.

algaEntityType.title: Alga Entity Type
algaEntityType.description: The type of Alga entity that failed to map (e.g., 'item', 'tax_code', 'term').

algaEntityId.title: Alga Entity ID
algaEntityId.description: The internal ID of the Alga entity.

algaEntityName.title: Alga Entity Name
algaEntityName.description: The display name of the Alga entity (if available).

errorMessage.title: Error Message
errorMessage.description: The specific mapping error message from the workflow.

qboEntityId.title: Correct QBO Entity ID
qboEntityId.description: Enter the correct QuickBooks Online ID for the corresponding Alga entity. You may need to look this up in QBO.

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: Add any relevant notes or comments.
